7 deadly sins of trading: 
 
Sloth:The belief that trading is easy money 
 
Lust:Spending profits instead of compounding capital 
 
Pride:Inability to admit you're wrong 
 
Wrath:Revenge trading 
 
Greed:Trying to get rich quick

Gluttony: Trading too big
